name: Yank
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
**Targets** Single creature you are considered Connected to.
Requirements You have at least one hand free, unless you are considered Connected to the target by a hand. Target cannot be more than one size larger than you, unless you have an ability that otherwise increases the size limits on combat maneuvers such as Shove.
-
You pull a connected target closer to yourself by pulling on whatever is connecting you. Attempt an Athletics check against the Fortitude DC of the target. 
Critical Success You pull your target up to 10 feet towards you. You can Stride after it, but you must move the same distance and in the same direction. 
Success You pull your opponent back 5 feet towards you. You can stride after it, but you must move the same distance and in the same direction. 
Critical Failure You lose your balance, fall, and land prone.
